feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2024-01-18: Big bug in v. 8.22.16!
entry.content: Current version rollback to 8.22.14 waiting for fix
entry.summary: Current version rollback to 8.22.14 waiting for fix

entry.title: 2024-01-23: v. 8.22.17 available
entry.content: Fix various bugs and introduce an improved zoom function
entry.summary: Fix various bugs and introduce an improved zoom function

entry.title: 2024-04-07: v. 8.25 available
entry.content: BORIS has the dark mode and a mute/unmute button for each media player!! See Preferences > Interface
entry.summary: BORIS has the dark mode and a mute/unmute button for each media player!! See Preferences > Interface

entry.title: 2024-04-18: v. 8.25.4 available
entry.content: Fixed bug when importing a Noldus Observer project without modifiers
entry.summary: Fixed bug when importing a Noldus Observer project without modifiers

entry.title: 2024-04-18: PDF version of the user guide is available
